array1: David-Michael went to the movies with his best friend
array2: Ethan walked into a grocery store.
array3: Ethan and David-Michael were playing Uno this morning.

array1: When he goes to use the bathroom, he steps on a Lego.
array2: When he goes to buy a snack, he sees a Marvel movie poster.
array3: Ethan sets down an Uno reverse card.

array1: 'Who uses Legos in a movie theater?' he asks.
array2: 'I should really go watch that movie,' he said.
array3: David-Michael says, 'Am I a joke to you?'
